issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Appcelerator Modules
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Modules here.

fields.description:
Hi, I want to share notes on facebook with my application created in "classic", but I can not log in to facebook, create an unicode based on KitchenSink, but do not configure TiApp.xml and strings.xml files. I followed documentation:
http://docs.appcelerator.com/platform/latest/#!/api/Modules.Facebook
I've also followed: https://github.com/appcelerator-modules/ti.facebook, but it always gives me some error.
I ask for help to configure code.
Thank you

Hello, what I want is to add a botonde share facebook to my application and I can not.
My error is in the configuration of the files: "tiapp.xml" and file "strings.xml".
Another error is that I have is that I will not create share button.
Thank you.
Running the application gives me the following error:
Alert
SERVER_ERROR:[message]:Error performing query,[extra]:
Errors while executing operation
"ProxyAuthAppLoginStartQuery":At
Query.proxy_auth_app_login_start:Failed to resolve field.
I attach the code to a file
fields.summary: I want to share notes on facebook with my application

comments.body: Hey there, please share the error with us before. Posting to the notes is done via the Graph Request API that you can also use with Ti.Facebook. Ensure to properly authorize before.

Hello, what I want is to add a botonde share facebook to my application and I can not.
My error is in the configuration of the files: "tiapp.xml" and file "strings.xml".
Another error is that I have is that I will not create share button.
Thank you.
Running the application gives me the following error:
Alert
SERVER_ERROR:[message]:Error performing query,[extra]:
Errors while executing operation
"ProxyAuthAppLoginStartQuery":At
Query.proxy_auth_app_login_start:Failed to resolve field.
I attach the code to a file

Hello, This is our bug reporting site. If you having a problem with your code you can send us the sample code that we can test to verify the issue. If this is our platform related problem we will forward for a fix. If you are looking for a coding support, please contact in support.appcelerator.com or if you are a premier customer you can chat with one of our expert for coding support. Thanks.
